full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Tender Information

| Title | **Pedestal Mounted Slewing Knuckle Boom Cranes** |
| --- | --- |
| Reference Number | PW-XLV-176-8390 |
| Amendment Number | 4 |
| Solicitation Number | F7049-220116/A |
| Publication Date | August 11, 2022 |
| Tender Closing Date | September 16, 2022 (17:00:00) |

#### Background and Requirements

The Canadian Coast Guard, on behalf of Fisheries and Oceans Canada, has identified a need to procure two pedestal mounted slewing knuckle boom cranes. Deliveries will be made in accordance with Annex A, Requirement, with crane number 1 to be delivered on or before March 1, 2024, and crane number 2 by August 1, 2024.

#### Trade Agreement and Pricing

This procurement will be conducted under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA). Bidders are required to submit a comprehensive proposal outlining a clear understanding of the requirements, their technical and financial capabilities, and a pricing structure that reflects the best value for the Canadian Coast Guard.

#### Tendering Process

All interested suppliers are eligible to participate in this competitive tendering process. Electronic bidding will be conducted using the Canada Post epost Connect application. This online service enables the submission of large files, up to Protected B level, for easy review and evaluation.

#### Health and Safety Measures

To mitigate the risks associated with COVID-19, suppliers are required to follow established safety protocols, adhering to on-site distancing measures and guidelines.

#### Attachment and Delivery Requirements

Documents relating to this tender may be submitted in either official language, French or English. A detailed list of attachments is available online.

#### Contact Information

Please direct any questions or inquiries to:
Andre Godin, Contracting Officer
Public Works and Government Services Canada
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
Gatineau, Quebec
K1A 0S5
